title: Dyre
extract: Dyre is a virus. It is capable of hijacking all three major web browsers and intercepting internet banking sessions in order to harvest the victim's credentials and send them to the attackers. It also downloads additional malware on to the victim's computer.
extract_html: Dyre is a virus. It is capable of hijacking all three major web browsers and intercepting internet banking sessions in order to harvest the victim's credentials and send them to the attackers. It also downloads additional malware on to the victim's computer.
